articles.title: Copa America 2024 Final Highlights: Argentina Beat Colombia 1-0, Clinch Back-To-Back Titles - NDTV Sports
articles.description: America 2024 Final, Argentina vs Colombia Highlights: Lionel Messi injured but Argentina clinch title with 1-0 win, thanks to Lautaro Martinez's extra-time goal.
articles.content: Copa America 2024 Final, Argentina vs Colombia Highlights: Argentina clinched the Copa America 2024 title despite seeing Lionel Messi being substituted off in the second half due to an injury. Substi… [+508 chars]

articles.author: LINDSEY BAHR
articles.title: ‘Despicable Me 4’ reigns at box office, while ‘Longlegs’ gets impressive start - The Associated Press
articles.description: Gru and the minions are celebrating a second week in first place at the North American box office. But the surprise of the weekend was a small horror movie called “Longlegs” that upset the $100 million “Fly Me to the Moon.” The supremacy of “Despicable Me 4” …
articles.content: Gru and the minions celebrated a second week in first place at the North American box office this weekend, while a small horror movie called Longlegs upset the starry $100 million Fly Me to the Moon.… [+3934 chars]
